name: Erinyes
description: The Erinyes resembles a dark, fallen angel with large black-feathered wings and dark armor stained with the blood of enemies.
memorable: Erinyes are deadly combatants that blend swordplay with poison and deception.
goals: To hunt down defiers of infernal contracts and serve powerful devils.
relations: Often allied with other devils and fiends, particularly in their roles as enforcers and punishers.
environment: The Nine Hells and other infernal realms.
strengths: Possesses high physical and magical defenses, resistance to multiple damage types, and lethal combat abilities.
attacks: Uses a longsword and longbow for melee and ranged attacks, both dealing slashing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ability to entangle foes with a lasso, limiting their movement.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions.
skills: Skilled in Athletics, Insight, and Perception showing its physical prowess and keen awareness.
additional_information: Immunities to fire and poison damage
Can parry melee attacks to increase its AC
Magic Resistance for better defense against spells
Multiattack allowing three attacks per turn
Can poison enemies with its weapon attacks
test_queries: dark angel with wings and armor
fiendish warrior from the Nine Hells
lethal combatant that uses poison in attacks
entity that entangles enemies with a lasso
